segments.text: Hello . I was wondering if Taylor Smith has checked out yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just one moment . I'll check with the cancer ward desk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The cancer ward ! ? Oh , my . It's worse than we thought .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ma'am , I'm sorry . The cancer ward said Mr . Smith passed away two days ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's impossible ! I'm talking about Mister Taylor Smith .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , ma'am . He died from complications of stomach cancer . I'm very sorry .
segments.speaker: S2
